refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the size of the current viewing cube to the specified view_size (in local units).

refsection.para: Sets the size of the current viewing cube to the specified view_size (in local units). This size is the length of any side of the square mged display. This command is a synonym for the size command.
The example shows the use of the viewsize command to set the mged display to a specified number of units.

info.title: Set the size of the mged display.

example.para: Sets the mged display to be 250 units across.
